head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GORBATY, RABBI AARON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GORBATY, RABBI AARON

block.p: GORBATY-Rabbi Aaron. On June 17, 2000. Husband of the late Pearl Gorbaty (nee Shulman). Father of Lionel Gorbaty, Barbara Rosenberg, Sheila Silver, Isaac Gorbaty, Elliot Gorbaty and Mayer Gorbaty. Brother of Julius Gorbaty. Survived by 12 grandchildren. Service and interment at Beth Moses Cemetery, Pinelawn, on Monday, June 19, at 1:30 PM. For more information call Sol Levinson & Bros. at 1-800-338-1701.

GORBATY-Rabbi Aaron. On June 17, 2000. Husband of the late Pearl Gorbaty (nee Shulman). Father of Lionel Gorbaty, Barbara Rosenberg, Sheila Silver, Isaac Gorbaty, Elliot Gorbaty and Mayer Gorbaty. Brother of Julius Gorbaty. Survived by 12 grandchildren. Service and interment at Beth Moses Cemetery, Pinelawn, on Monday, June 19, at 1:30 PM. For more information call Sol Levinson & Bros. at 1-800-338-1701.
